timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
this.periodService = new DefaultPeriodService(periodStore, sessionFactory);
this.periodService = new DefaultPeriodService( periodStore, sessionFactory );
timeline.author: stian-sandvold

timeline.body: Ideally, the close statement should have its own try-finally block, as the commit operation might also fail, leaving the session open. Perhaps move those two statements to a utility method.

replies.bodyText: Agree, fixed by adding method DbmsUtils.closeStatelessSession( session );
